name: FLOW (itch) (pickled peanuts)
description:
NOTE: the game is best played with a higher sensitivity

(id recommend reading the tutorial before playing)

Your computer (yes the one you're on) contacts you about a virus that has invaded your PC! Thankfully, using the little control your computer has over itself, it gives you the necessary tools you need to combat the virus

made for the 4th WOWIE game jam!
